category: Best Actor in a Leading Role

nominations.notes: Crosby became the first actor to be twice nominated for an Oscar for portraying the same character; he had previously portrayed Father Chuck O'Malley in Going My Way (1944).

category: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role

nominations.notes: Joan Crawford was not present at the awards ceremony and feigned ill that night. Meanwhile she listened to the show on the radio. When she won, she ushered the press into her bedroom, where she finally accepted her Oscar.

category: Best Actress in a Supporting Role

primary.name: To the Shores of Iwo Jima

nominations.notes: For the song "It Might as Well Be Spring"
For the song "I Fall in Love Too Easily"
For the song "I'll Buy That Dream"
For the song "Aren't You Glad You're You"
For the song "The Cat and the Canary"

category: Best Music, Scoring of a Dramatic or Comedy Picture
Best Music, Scoring of a Musical Picture

nominations.notes: On 10 September 2001 Kevin Spacey purchased Stoll's Oscar statuette at a Butterfields auction in Los Angeles and returned it to the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences.
